articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
RT nader (🧱, 🚀) | nader.arweave.dev | nader.lens 🧢
Learned more about @fuellabs_ after meeting @IAmNickDodson, some points:
1. Blazing fast modular execution layer
2. Parallel execution
3. @swaylang 😍 (Rust-based DSL)
4. Beautiful DX (Sway toolchain)
5. Built-in indexing / GraphQL API
6. Can be deployed to Ethereum & Celestia

articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
RT Francesco Andreoli | andreolf.ethᵍᵐ
.@VitalikButerin claims that #ETH will be able to process "100k TPS", following the completion of 5 phases: 
1️⃣ Merge
2️⃣ Surge
3️⃣ Verge
4️⃣ Purge
5️⃣ Splurge 
Yesterday, at #ethcc, he outlined those stages which is only 55% done after the merge
Here's what they look like ⬇️
